*Twister snarls stands stiff staring at the auto guns*

*Blizzard sighs and=
 picks Sinesis up. She stands up and stumbles some but keeps her balance. B=
lizzard carefully walks closer to the Pred Base an stands next to Twister w=
ho isn't moving an inch. Blizzard just took her chances and walks to enter =
the Pred Base. Twister waits to see if Blizzard gets shot before she tries =
to enter*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egr=
oups.com 
  Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 10:34 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast W=
ars


  "Autoguns, Blizzard and Twister, reconized as friends." Sinesis sai=
d, hoping his words would work on the base although he was never granted th=
e access to let new members into the Predacons as far as he knew.

  OCC: G=
o ahead, pick up Sinesis, I do not mind...
    ----- Original Message -----=
 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, =
July 14, 2000 10:16 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *Blizzard sigh=
s when Sinesis punches himself* Blizzard: Twister! Get back here and help! =
*Blizzard yells out to Twister who was heading for the base* Twister: Your =
not the boss of me!!!!! *Twister says and than runs towards the Pred base b=
ut is shot by the auto guns. She backs out of the range of the auto guns af=
ter being shot several times* Twister: SLAG!


    *Blizzard sighs and trie=
s to pick Sinesis up*
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECO=
DE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 8:29 PM=

      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      "Yeah, I got all of him, unfortu=
nently." Sinesis said, taking Blizzard's hand and trying to get up. He is u=
nable and he hits himself in the face...
        ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        =
Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 4:43 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


 =
       *Blizzard bends down* Blizzard: Do you have all of Sinister? *Blizza=
rd says to Sinesis*
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From:=
 THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, July 14=
, 2000 4:04 AM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          "Fine, but=
 don't be surprised if I kill you!" Sinesis said to Blizzard, coughing a fe=
w times.

          "Ah, never mind that last sentence, I need help, too." =
Sinesis said...
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From:=
 ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Thu=
rsday, July 13, 2000 12:36 AM
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


   =
         *Blizzard stopped reaching for Sinister's pieces when she saw Sine=
sis picking his parts up* Blizzard: Please let me help... *Blizzard says to=
 Sinesis*
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: T=
HECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Thursday,=
 July 13, 2000 12:14 AM
              Subject: Neo Beast Wars


           =
   Deemos helps Inzola back to their ship and he starts to repair her, but =
to no avail. Deemos, very hurt himself, went to the Predacon base.

       =
       "My wife, you see she in hurt, and I need to use your CR Chambers, I=
 have been told that this is the base of the mighty Hell Beast, how can I h=
elp you, Hell Beast? Just heal Inzola and myself!" Deemos called out to Any=
one in Hell Beast's base.

              Sinesis slowly crawled along, push=
ing Sinister's parts. Sinesis stopped every mile to catch his breath, his j=
ets her wrecked. He kept going and going and going.

              Plintiss=
a seen a letter from Dracona, saying she had retruned to base. Plintissa sh=
rugged and walked along her way. Artist tripped her up and walked on ahead.=
 Plintissa felt like crying again, this is the one she loved? Artist laughe=
d and went on his way.

              Dracona picked up the device, but sud=
denly, the device exploded, sending a fireball into the Predacon base. (Meg=
atron's base) Dracona gasped. She had better be going now. She slowly start=
ed to sneak away.

              The Radicons hurried on their way, maybe s=
ome other team would apreciate their skills, like the Alliance. Airbomber j=
ust hoped that Infectra would come with them.

              Lightmare's sp=
ark joined the Matrix, she is DEAD.

              Gangon's spark hovered i=
n front of BrightBlade, swirling around her over and over again.

---------=
